page.title: 13BECKLEY SCHOOL - ACTIVITIES
page.content: The school year starts in September. Usually, swimming continues for the rest of the month. Harvest Festival takes place early in October. Organised games played in the autumn include football and netball. Christmas events include a Wassail with carols, Mummers Play and hot punch, a Carol Service in Church and a party with Father Christmas. Towards the end of the Spring Term a concert is usually held on a stage in the school hall. May Festivities take place on or near Ascension Day and sports are held on the school playing field in early June. Other events may be held such as Fetes, It's a Knockout Contests, Exhibitions, Swimming Galas, etc. The Summer Term also sees class outings. School Clubs include Recorder Club, Chess, Country Dance, Pets, Computer & Model Train.
